pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Mixed-Effects Model for Analyzing Cluster-Level Non-Ignorable Missing Data // Contains functions for estimating a mixed- effects model for clustered data (or batch-processed data) with cluster-level (or batch- level) missing values in the outcome, i.e., the outcomes of some clusters are either all observed or missing altogether. The model is developed for analyzing incomplete data from labeling-based quantitative proteomics experiments but is not limited to this type of data. We used an expectation conditional maximization (ECM) algorithm for model estimation. The cluster-level missingness may depend on the average value of the outcome in the cluster (missing not at random).
